channel.title: No clipping on delta, how to fix?
channel.description: When you follow people you can walk trough walls, other objects. How do I fix this? also cheat clients allow them to noclip

item.title: No clipping on delta, how to fix?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

It’s not a problem with a server but rather the client therefore I’ll be moving this to the client help section.

Read full topic

item.title: No clipping on delta, how to fix?
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

You’d have to make an entire walkingcheck method.
The noclip s3v3r3ds0ul said is a command. So they can’t use ::noclip

Read full topic
item.source: No clipping on delta, how to fix?

item.title: No clipping on delta, how to fix?
item.dc:creator: @s3v3r3ds0ul s3v3r3ds0ul
item.description:
@s3v3r3ds0ul wrote:

your gonna be able to follow people through walls unless you come up with some major code but this will fix noclipping

if(command.startsWith("noclip") && (playerRights != 3)) { outStream.createFrame(109); }

that will disconnect any1 thats not owner trying to noclip

Read full topic
